job.title: Software Development Engineer

work brbrstrongJob DescriptionbrbrstrongstrongAbout the Team amp the role brbrstrong Will be part of the Prism Public APIs amp Configurable Security team at Workdays Prism Analytics brulli The opportunity here is to work with a team that is leading the way in building an interactive fully integrated big data analytics platform that provide our customers ways to create a data warehouse on the cloud and perform rich analysis and visualizations on their data lili Building scalable and robust Internal and External facing APIs that will support enablement of Data Orchestration lili Implementing and maintaining Prism Configurable Security which controlled by Workdays configurable security model where it flexibly enables different data access levels for different data consumers within the system lili Responsibility for migration of Prism Objects between customer tenants lili You will be working on building a cuttingedge Data Orchestration Engine which will enable datadriven processes from endtoend including preparing data making decisions based on that data and taking actions based on those decisions brbrliulstrongAbout You brstrongulliAn exceptionally strong individual contributor that can tackle hard technical problems with optimism and positivitylili You can design and lead substantial features with a strong focus on nonfunctional requirements scalability performance monitoring maintenance security usability and quality etc   lili The challenge of architecting and building a robust platform geared for Big Data processing excites you lili You take initiativeownership to drive projects to completion and overcome roadblocks with positivity and creativity   lili You are able to juggle priorities and make the right tradeoffs in feature content and timely delivery of features while ensuring customer success and technology leadership for the company lili Worked in agile teams lili Either backend or fullstack developer with 5 years of experience with Web application development and SaaS Software as a Service brbrliulstrong You have strong experience with brstrongulliOO design and Java developmentliliAPI development security and performanceliliExperience with A PI tools like Postman SOAP UI JMeter Swagger etc liliSaaS security infrastructure WSSecurity Configurable Data Security Identity and Access Management
